raw_text: DIAS,​ DOROTHY – Beloved wife of the late Bede,​ cherished mother of Rohan (USA),​ Nirmal,​ Srilal (Australia) and remembered in loving memory of the late Thilak,​ Ivan and Luckie (UK). She was mother-in-law to Illika,​ Sandamali,​ Marina,​ Renuka and Prasanna,​ Dorothy was a loving sister to Edna Devagiri and Ranjaini Abeysena. She peacefully departed from us on the 3rd of September 2023. Her remains will be placed for viewing at 681,​ Aluthmawatha Road,​ Mutwal,​ Colombo 15,​ on the 8th of September from midday. Cortege leaves at 3 p.m. on the 9th for burial at Madampitiya Cemetery after the service at St. James Church,​ Mutwal.056673

KULANDRA (KULEN) RATNESER – 18.03.1933-21.08.2023 – Passed away peacefully in Darwin on 21st August,​ 2023 aged 90. Beloved husband of Sujatha. Dearly loved father of Rajiv and Sanjiv and father-in-law of Jane and Monique,​ much loved grandfather of Grace,​ William,​ Teddy,​ Milo and Lucky,​ steadfast guardian of our laws till the end. Loved and remembered always. Rest in peace. The Memorial Service for Kulandra Ratneser of Nedlands will be held at Christ Church School Chapel,​ Queenslea Drive,​ Claremont in Western Australia at 11.00 a.m. (GMT+8) on Saturday 09.09.2023. To view the livestream,​ please visit our website – www.bowraodea.com.au056014
